title: Bitcoin Bounce Puts Altcoin Bears at Risk
description: Bitcoin's bounce amid fears of FTX creditor liquidation might shake out altcoin bears, leading to a sharp rally in recently shorted tokens like solana.

title: South Korea’s Crypto Ecosystem Shakes Off Terra Debacle, With Gaming Dominating Web3 Activity
description: Korean banks are gradually dipping their toes in the market, and gaming firms are trying to capitalize in the crypto-frenzied market.

title: AI tool 86% accurate in predicting judge verdicts without evidence, only bias in past judgments
description:
According to Axios, Pre/Dicta, an AI-powered database, is reshaping the traditional dynamics of civil litigation by predicting judges’ decisions, thereby assisting lawyers and plaintiffs in efficiently investing their resources. Launched in 2022, Pre/Dicta uses around 120 data points to identify patterns and potential biases in a judge’s past decisions. These data points range from the […]

The post AI tool 86% accurate in predicting judge verdicts without evidence, only bias in past judgments appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Borroe.Finance Investors Pocket 25% ROI, Litecoin ($LTC) and Arbitrum ($ARB) Keep Dropping
description: Borroe.Finance investors are enjoying huge profits after $ROE gained by 25% in its presale. However, Litecoin ($LTC) is greatly impacted by the bearish sentiment in the crypto space, and it keeps sliding. Elsewhere, Arbitrum ($ARB) is imploding, and it keeps setting new all-time lows as more investors exit the market. Can Arbitrum and Litecoin reverse [...]

title: Man Threatens Lawsuit to Unearth $192 Million Bitcoin Fortune Buried in Landfill
description: A Bitcoin holder is threatening to sue the city council of his residence after they refused him access to dig up a hard drive containing millions of Bitcoins.  According to the Bitcoin user, the amount of Bitcoin contained in the hard drive is estimated to be valued at 192 million euros at this time.  According [...]

title: US-Städte starten $14.940.000 Grundeinkommensversuche – Wann wird die Regierung Bitcoin (BTC) abwerfen?
description: Mehrere US-Städte, darunter Austin, Philadelphia und Santa Clara, haben Bargeld an Geringverdiener verteilt, um die wirtschaftlichen Auswirkungen zu verstehen. Mehr als 54 Millionen amerikanische Investoren haben die Initiative ergriffen, Bitcoin zu akkumulieren, um die hohe Inflation zu bekämpfen. Die Bundesregierung der Vereinigten Staaten steht im Rampenlicht, weil sie im Namen der wirtschaftlichen Ankurbelung Geld an [...]

title: Analyst Who Nailed 2022 Crypto Bottom Unveils New Long Position on Bitcoin – Here Are His Targets
description:
An analyst who predicted the crypto bottom in November of 2022 is re-entering the market after Bitcoin (BTC) briefly dropped below the $25,000 support level earlier this week. Pseudonymous crypto strategist DonAlt tells the 53,100 subscribers of the TechnicalRoundup YouTube channel that he faced two choices before he opened a new position on Bitcoin. “We’re […]

The post Analyst Who Nailed 2022 Crypto Bottom Unveils New Long Position on Bitcoin – Here Are His Targets appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
